name: Minimal OpenGL Utility Library
short_description: This Minimal OpenGL Utility Library is a library similar to GLUT, only with fewer features! You can write window-system-independent OpenGL programs with even fewer lines of code than GLUT. Initial support for X11 and Win32. Examples.
